items.description: First item at container start with border offset
Second item with 10px gap from first item (2 + 100 + 10 = 112)
Third item with 10px gap from second item (112 + 100 + 10 = 222)

test_notes.gap_behavior: CSS gap property creates 10px spacing between flex items
test_notes.border_offset: Container has 2px border, so items start at x=2, y=2
test_notes.total_width_used: 3 items (100px each) + 2 gaps (10px each) + 2 borders (2px each) = 324px of 400px available
